name: redux-action-factory
description: Simple library for creating schema-validated Redux Actions (or thunks, promises, etc.). Powered by the awesomely awesome Schema-Inspector.

scripts.test: find ./test -name '*.test.js' | cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs mocha -r test/index.js --compilers js:babel-register --recursive
scripts.cover: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs istanbul cover _mocha `find ./test -name '*.test.js'` -- -r test/index.js --compilers js:babel-register
scripts.build: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib && cp src/configSchema.json lib/
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm test && npm run build

author: neidt.kwirke@gmail.com
